description: Try our easy to follow Gorgonzola With Figs & Honey recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Gorgonzola With Figs & Honey Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs vegetable oil, for the pan

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly oil a ridged grill pan over medium-high heat. Grill the figs, cut-side down, for 4 minutes, or until browned.
When the figs are browned, gently turn them and cook on the other side for 3-4 minutes.
Remove the figs from the pan and place them in a shallow dish. Sprinkle with Gorgonzola, drizzle with honey, and serve immediately.
